name: rawpixel-downloader
description: Automated tool for downloading CC0 (public domain) images from Rawpixel boards with metadata extraction

scripts.postinstall:
echo '
âœ… Dependencies installed!

Next step: Install Chromium browser with:
  npm run install-browser

Then set up your session cookie:
  npm run setup-cookie

Finally, run the downloader:
  npm start
'
